LightningComponentBundle.description: Distribution visualization for numeric fields using automatic binning. Click bins to navigate to filtered records.

property.name: soqlQuery
property.label: SOQL Query
property.description: SOQL query to fetch data for distribution analysis
property.placeholder: SELECT Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Amount > 0

property.name: valueField
property.label: Value Field
property.description: API name of the numeric field to analyze

property.name: xAxisLabel
property.label: X-Axis Label
property.description: Display label for X-axis (defaults to field name)

property.name: binCount
property.label: Number of Bins
property.description: Number of histogram bins (0 = auto-calculate based on data)

property.name: showNormalCurve
property.label: Show Normal Curve
property.description: Overlay a normal distribution curve on the histogram

property.name: showStatistics
property.label: Show Statistics
property.description: Display mean, median, standard deviation, and count

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Object API name for navigation on bin click

property.name: filterField
property.label: Filter Field
property.description: Field to use for filtering when navigating (defaults to valueField)
